about_the_game:
You are a politician determined to save our dying planet. Time is slipping away, as endless political debates and ineffective policies continue to suffocate the Earth under the weight of pollution. You must take action before the damage becomes irreversible. The future of humanity rests on your shoulders, and every decision you make carries immense consequences.


In Seaburn, you play as a policymaker whose choices shape the fate of the planet and your political career. Your actions influence both public opinion and the world’s health, forcing you to constantly decide what to prioritise. However, if the world’s health collapses, your journey ends. If your public opinion plummets, you'll be ousted from office.



LEGISLATION
The papers on your desk allow you to sign legislation. Each piece of legislation presents its own set of potential outcomes, requiring you to carefully weigh the pros and cons. You can sign three bills per week, with every choice impacting your popularity, world health, and political budget—either for better or worse.



EVENTS
The corkboard on the wall allows you to attend events. Each event presents four distinct options, all of which can affect public opinion and world health in different ways. Events appear every few weeks and affect public opinion and world health drastically, so choose your responses wisely.



ELECTIONS
Every eight weeks, prepare for an election that could determine your political future. Your chances of staying in office are tied directly to your public opinion, so be mindful of how you govern as the next election draws closer.


Discover more about your office throughout the journey, and reach the 52nd week to solidify your place as a successful politician.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Seaburn is a choice-based political simulator where your choices affect the future of the planet. Play as a policymaker as you sign legislation, respond to events, and compete in high-stakes elections. Earn money, become popular, and save the environment.
